channel.title: How come when i hit the monsters i can only hit the once!help
channel.description: what do i have to do when i want to change the monster's health beacause i only hit them onetime and then they die :confused:

item.title: How come when i hit the monsters i can only hit the once!help
item.dc:creator: @Duhsmersh Duhsmersh
item.description:
@Duhsmersh wrote:

not really but i guess. you can’t edit 127.0.0.1. it’s not connected to the internet so no one else can get on “yours.” make a private server then you can do all these things you wanted help with.

item.title: How come when i hit the monsters i can only hit the once!help
item.dc:creator: @iBoot iBoot
item.description:
@iBoot wrote:

Open npc.cfg

// NpcID NpcName combat health npc = 0 Hans 0 0 npc = 1 Man 2 7 npc = 2 Man 2 7 npc = 3 Man 2 7

The health is the last variable, edit that to your liking then comile and run.

Note: The NPC must have a combat level.

Read full topic
item.source: How come when i hit the monsters i can only hit the once!help

item.title: How come when i hit the monsters i can only hit the once!help
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

Ok,go to autospawn.cfg,then type in the name of the monster you wana spawn,and the co-ordinates it’s supposed to spawn at.THEN go to the monsters HP and change it to want you want.

here what it might look like ( first time I ever did a mini-tut for someone,I’m also Canada’s worst coder lol.

 autospawn tztokjad=lvl702@Y4823 X6313 monsterhp:100

So,basically it’s saying-spawn tz-tok jad combat lvl 702 @ the co-ordinates of Y4823 X6313.It willl spawn him there auto-matically,and when people attack it he will have 100hp-they have to work now to bring him down.

PS: As I said,I am known as Canada’s worst coder.I gave you an EXAMPLE of what it should look like.If you do this,dont PM me flaming we cuz your server got 10 errors lolz.

Read full topic
